title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 551.5 - Public inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 551.5 - Public inspection of records

State Regulations
(a) Records shall be made available at the
main office of the Office of Information Technology Services, which is located
at: NYS Office of Information Technology Services

Empire State Plaza

Swan Street Building, Core 4

Albany, NY 12223
(b) The Office of Information Technology

Services shall accept requests for records and produce records during the hours
9:00 a.m. through 12:00 p.m. and 1:00 p.m. through 4:00 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
551.5

Amended

New

York State Register April 4, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 14, eff. 4/4/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
